titleStmt.title: Judicium & decretum Universitatis Oxoniensis latum in convocatione habita Jul. 21, an. 1683, contra quosdam perniciosos libros & propositiones impias quae capitibus sacratissimorum principum, eorum statui & regimini, & omni humanae societati exitium intentant.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
